page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content:
All housing in the area is connected to mains electricity & water supplies. DEANSTON VILLAGE Housing here consists of tenement type buildings along the main street which was the original village. The stone facades have been retained while the interiors have been renovated to provide modern accommodation. Newer Council built semi-detached houses overlook the old village.
RURAL AREA Privately owned houses are of bungalow or villa type. Farmhouses and cottages have kept their originality outwardly but most have been added to and modernised.
GARTINCABER HOUSE This house is presently in the process of restoration and renovation.
